com.salimov.yurii.service.data.impl

Class ArticleServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salimov.yurii.service.data.impl.DataServiceImpl<T,E>
      • com.salimov.yurii.service.data.impl.ContentServiceImpl<Article,java.lang.Long>
        • com.salimov.yurii.service.data.impl.ArticleServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ArticleService, ContentService<Article,java.lang.Long>, DataService<Article,java.lang.Long>

    @Service
 @ComponentScan(basePackages={"com.salimov.yurii.dao","com.salimov.yurii.service.data"})
public final class ArticleServiceImpl
extends ContentServiceImpl<Article,java.lang.Long>
implements ArticleService
    The class of the service layer, implements a set of methods for working with objects of the Article class.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Yurii Salimov (yurii.alex.salimov@gmail.com)
    See Also:
    Article, ArticleService, ContentServiceImpl, DataServiceImpl, ArticleDao
